properties.entry: select stl.*,st.name as TAG_NAME, (select name from sc_user where login_id = stl.creator) as CREATOR_NAME, (select name from sc_user where login_id = stl.logor) as LOGOR_NAME from sc_tag_log stl , sc_tag st where st.id = stl.tag_id and stl.entity_id = '{@#entityId#}' and stl.entity_type = '{@#entityType#}' order by stl.no desc

INSERT INTO sc_tag_entity (ID, TAG_ID, ENTITY_TYPE, ENTITY_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, MEMO ) VALUES ('{@#id#}', '{@#tagId#}', '{@#entityType##subEntityType#}', '{@#entityId#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW(), '{@#memo#}' )
INSERT INTO sc_tag_entity_details (ID, TAG_ENTITY_ID, MEMO, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ('{@#id#}', '{@#tagEntityId#}', '{@#memo#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW() )

select st.*, (select memo from sc_tag_entity ste where ste.entity_type = concat( stt.code,'{@#subEntityType#}') and ste.tag_id = st.id and ste.entity_id = '{@#entityId#}' ) as MEMO, (select id from sc_tag_entity ste where ste.entity_type = concat( stt.code,'{@#subEntityType#}') and ste.tag_id = st.id and ste.entity_id = '{@#entityId#}' ) as TAG_ENTITY_ID, (select count(*) from sc_tag_entity ste where ste.entity_type = concat( stt.code,'{@#subEntityType#}') and ste.tag_id = st.id and ste.entity_id = '{@#entityId#}' ) as COUNT, (select CREATE_DATE from sc_tag_entity ste where ste.entity_type = concat( stt.code,'{@#subEntityType#}') and ste.tag_id = st.id and ste.entity_id = '{@#entityId#}' ) as CREATE_DATE, (select s.name from sc_tag_entity ste , sc_user s where s.login_id = ste.creator and ste.entity_type = concat( stt.code,'{@#subEntityType#}') and ste.tag_id = st.id and ste.entity_id = '{@#entityId#}' ) as CREATOR_NAME from sc_tag st,sc_tag_type stt where st.type_id = stt.id and stt.code = '{@#entityType#}'
select s.*, (select name from sc_user where login_id = s.creator) as CREATOR_NAME from sc_tag_entity_details s where s.tag_entity_id = '{@#tagEntityId#}'
